publicParcel.title: Food Parcel Pickup
publicParcel.qrCodeDescription: Show this QR code when picking up your food parcel

statusDescription.scheduled: Your pickup is scheduled. Please arrive during the pickup window.
statusDescription.ready: Your food parcel is ready for pickup now!
statusDescription.collected: This food parcel has already been collected.
statusDescription.expired: This pickup is no longer valid. Please contact staff if you have questions.
statusDescription.cancelled: This pickup has been cancelled. You do not need to come.

publicPrivacy.title: Privacy Policy
publicPrivacy.noPolicy: No privacy policy has been configured yet. Contact {brandName} for more information.
publicPrivacy.fallbackNotice: This policy is shown in Swedish as it is not available in your selected language.
